alert.note: Alert for Eastern Essex; Western Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 3:13PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Showers and thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Essex County through 400 PM EDT... At 311 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a heavy showers with some rumbles of thunder over Haverhill, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, pea size hail, and locally heavy downpours. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Lawrence, Haverhill, Methuen, North Andover, Newburyport, Amesbury, Ipswich, Salisbury, Georgetown, Boxford, Newbury, Groveland, Merrimac, Rowley, and West Newbury. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.
